metadata.name: DEyes Assembled Collection #1
metadata.description:
This artwork was assembled in likeness of the original DecentralEyesMashup Portraits (DEyes), which were one of the 3 genesis projects released on ASYNC Blueprints. The first 23 DEyes Assembled Collection portraits were awarded to registered collectors holding 5 DEyes. Over a 6 month event, collectors collaborated in the selection of traits by opting in and out of drops to create a unique 1/1 portrait. Participation resulted in combinations that unlocked unknown traits to create further uniqueness and scarcity. In honor of the original DEyes collection, the rarest of the original traits are gilded. This adds a unique vibe to the Assembled Collection.

Assembled initiated by Coldie

The original DEyes collection these are generated from is a generative edition celebrating the Decentral Eyes OG portrait series. This edition uses 12 layers to create 623 unique 1/1 portrait artworks featuring 9 faces who have shaped the early days of the decentralized blockchain revolution.

Vitalik Buterin, Andreas Antonopoulos, John McAfee, Edward Snowden, Julian Assange, Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss, Dalai Lama, Warren Buffett, Alan Turing.
